verbs.description: After years of discussion , former heavyweight champion Jack Johnson [V: was] granted a pardon by President Donald Trump : Boxing Report 2018 .
[ARGM-TMP: After years of discussion] , [ARG2: former heavyweight champion Jack Johnson] was [V: granted] [ARG1: a pardon] [ARG0: by President Donald Trump] : [C-ARG1: Boxing Report 2018] .
